page.title: 07ROADS AROUND COLD ASHTON
page.content: For the main part,{transport}goes through the area rather than about it.The{A46}road takes vehicles from Bath to Gloucester and Cheltenham or to the{motorway (M4)}junction at Tormarton and thence to London or Wales.The 2 roads cross at a large {roundabout}at Cold Ashton. This recently replaced traffic lights as is the custom at present. There are 5{buses}aday from Bristol to Chippenham and a less frequent service to Bath. A private bus goes through the lanes once a week to pick up villagers anywhere along the route.The large supermarket 5 miles away provides free transport once a week. A{traffic count}mid morning showed many lorries using both roads,as well as private cars. The roads are very busy morning and evening.
